name: Five Nights At Rockys World
description:
-Full Version of Five Nights at Rocky's World-

Youre are a Night Guard at Rockys World. Doing the day it is a beautiful place for kids but in the Night time the Robots starts to move around searching for you the NightGuard. Doors and a Tablet are the only friends on your site. Limited Power. Will you Survie?

-Controls-
